summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jacadi DSR Dashboard MVP. Backend API testing achieved 94.7% success rate (18/19 tests passed). Frontend UI testing successful with login flow, dashboard metrics display, navigation, and data management functionality all working properly. Backend-frontend integration verified through CSV upload and data display.

minor_bugs.issue: Authorization test expects 401 but returns 422 status code for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Very low - endpoint is still properly protected

ui_bugs.issue: Missing data-testid attributes for automated testing
ui_bugs.selector: data-testid attributes not found on metric cards
ui_bugs.status: FIXED - Added data-testid prop to MetricCard component

passed_tests: User registration and admin login (JWT authentication)
All 7 dashboard metrics endpoints (revenue, units, transactions, ATV, basket size, multies %, conversion)
Dashboard comparison (MTD vs last month, YTD vs last year)
Chart data endpoints (daily aggregation, by-store, by-channel)
CSV upload functionality (sales and footfall with deduplication)
Frontend login flow with redirect to dashboard
Dashboard displays all 7 metric cards with real data
Filter dropdowns (date range, store location, sales channel)
Data Management page with CSV upload buttons
Backend-frontend integration (CSV data flows to dashboard metrics)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor data-testid issue fixed)
